abstract: David Brooks Op-Ed column submits that political adversity has typically brought out scornful and secretive side of normally thoughtful Hillary Clinton; questions how she will react as she grapples more with brutal political climate in months leading up to 2016 presidential election; weighs whether Clinton will go strong, reacting defensively and hoarding information, or go large, rising above atmosphere of hostility and opening herself to both criticism and voter support.
lead_paragraph: The all-but-declared presidential candidate needs to rise above the warring tactics that helped to shape her political career if she hopes to be successful in 2016.
snippet: The all-but-declared presidential candidate needs to rise above the warring tactics that helped to shape her political career if she hopes to be successful in 2016.
